<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataBN extends data { const CODE = 'BN'; const PREFIX = 673; const REGION = 'Asia'; const PATTERNS = array( '[2-578]\d{6}', ); const TYPES = array( '22[0-7]\d{4}|(?:2[013-9]|[34]\d|5[0-25-9])\d{5}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '(?:22[89]|[78]\d\d)\d{4}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '5[34]\d{5}'=>array( 'voip', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2', ); }
